General.Name: Han Kook Capital Co. Ltd
General.Description: Han Kook Capital.Co., Ltd, together with its subsidiary, operates as a credit specialty company in South Korea. It primarily provides lease, venture capital, credits, factoring, and corporate restructuring services. The company was formerly known as Chungbu Leasing & Finance Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Han Kook Capital.Co., Ltd in October 2001. Han Kook Capital.Co., Ltd was founded in 1989 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
